title: Probing Planck-scale physics with quantum optics
title_cn: 用量子光学探测普朗克尺度的物理学
abstract: One of the main challenges in physics today is to merge quantum theory and the theory of general relativity into a unified framework. Researchers are developing various approaches towards such a theory of quantum gravity, but a major hindrance is the lack of experimental evidence of quantum gravitational effects. Yet, the quantization of spacetime itself can have experimental implications: the existence of a minimal length scale is widely expected to result in a modification of the Heisenberg uncertainty relation. Here we introduce a scheme to experimentally test this conjecture by probing directly the canonical commutation relation of the centre-of-mass mode of a mechanical oscillator with a mass close to the Planck mass. Our protocol uses quantum optical control and readout of the mechanical system to probe possible deviations from the quantum commutation relation even at the Planck scale. We show that the scheme is within reach of current technology. It thus opens a feasible route for table-top experiments to explore possible quantum gravitational phenomena.
abstract_cn: 当今物理学的主要挑战之一是将量子理论和广义相对论合并为一个统一的框架。研究人员正在为实现这种量子引力理论开发各种方法，但是主要障碍是缺乏量子引力效应的实验证据。然而，时空的量化本身可能具有实验意义：最小长度标尺的存在被普遍认为会导致海森堡不确定性关系的修正。在这里，我们介绍一种方案，通过直接探测质量接近于普朗克质量的机械振荡器的质心模的正则换向关系，来对这一猜想进行实验性测试。我们的协议使用量子光学控制和机械系统的读数来探测甚至在普朗克尺度下与量子换向关系的可能偏差。我们表明该方案是当前技术所能及的。从而为台式实验探索可能的量子引力现象开辟了一条可行的途径。

title: Three-dimensional localization of ultracold atoms in an optical disordered potential
title_cn: 超冷原子在无序电势中的三维定位
abstract: In disordered media, quantum interference effects are expected to induce complete suppression of electron conduction. The phenomenon, known as Anderson localization, has a counterpart with classical waves that has been observed in acoustics, electromagnetism and optics, but a direct observation for particles remains elusive. Here, we report the observation of the three-dimensional localization of ultracold atoms in a disordered potential created by a speckle laser field. A phenomenological analysis of our data distinguishes a localized component of the resulting density profile from a diffusive component. The observed localization cannot be interpreted as the classical trapping of particles with energy below the classical percolation threshold in the disorder, nor can it be understood as quantum trapping in local potential minima. Instead, our data are compatible with the self-consistent theory of Anderson localization tailored to our system, involving a heuristic energy shift that offers scope for future interpretation.
abstract_cn: 在无序的介质中，量子干扰效应有望诱导电子传导的完全抑制。这种现象被称为安德森本地化（Anderson localization），与古典波相对应，古典波在声学，电磁学和光学方面都已观察到，但是对粒子的直接观察仍然难以捉摸。在这里，我们报告在散斑激光场产生的无序电势中超冷原子的三维定位的观察。我们的数据的现象学分析将所得密度分布的局部成分与扩散成分区分开。观察到的局域化不能解释为该疾病中能量低于经典渗滤阈值的粒子的经典俘获，也不能理解为局部势极中的量子俘获。取而代之的是，我们的数据与为我们的系统量身定制的安德森本地化的自洽理论兼容，其中涉及启发式能量转移，为将来的解释提供了空间。

title: Two Ising-like magnetic excitations in a single-layer cuprate superconductor
title_cn: 单层铜酸盐超导体中的两个类似于Ising的磁激发
abstract: There exists increasing evidence that the phase diagram of the high-transition temperature (Tc) cuprate superconductors is controlled by a quantum critical point. According to one distinct theoretical proposal, on decreasing the hole-carrier concentration a transition occurs to an ordered state with two circulating orbital currents per CuO2 square. Below the ‘pseudogap’ temperature T*(T*>Tc), the theory predicts a discrete order parameter and two weakly-dispersive magnetic excitations in structurally simple compounds which should be measurable by neutron scattering. Indeed, novel magnetic order and one such excitation were recently observed. Here, we demonstrate for tetragonal HgBa2CuO4+δ the existence of a second excitation with local character, consistent with the theory. The excitations mix with conventional antiferromagnetic fluctuations, which points towards a unifying picture of magnetism in the cuprates that will probably require a multi-band description.
abstract_cn: 越来越多的证据表明，高转变温度（T ）铜酸盐超导体的相图受量子临界点控制。根据一项不同的理论建议，在降低空穴载流子浓度时，每CuO 2 平方有两个循环的轨道电流，过渡到有序状态。在＆＃8216; pseudogap＆＃8217;下方温度T * （T * > T c ），该理论在结构简单的情况下预测了离散阶参数和两个弱色散磁激发可以通过中子散射测量的化合物。实际上，最近观察到了新颖的磁阶和一种这样的激励。在这里，我们证明了四方HgBa 2 CuO 4 +＆＃948; ＆＃160;存在具有局部特征的第二激发，这与理论一致。激发与常规的反铁磁波动混合在一起，这指向铜酸盐中统一的磁性图，可能需要多波段描述。

title: Experimental observation of the optical spin transfer torque
title_cn: 光学自旋传递扭矩的实验观察
abstract: The spin transfer torque is a phenomenon in which angular momentum of a spin polarized electrical current entering a ferromagnet is transferred to the magnetization. The effect has opened a new research field of electrically driven magnetization dynamics in magnetic nanostructures and plays an important role in the development of a new generation of memory devices and tunable oscillators. Optical excitations of magnetic systems by laser pulses have been a separate research field the aim of which is to explore magnetization dynamics at short timescales and enable ultrafast spintronic devices. We report the experimental observation of the optical spin transfer torque, predicted theoretically several years ago, building the bridge between these two fields of spintronics research. In a pump-and-probe optical experiment we measure coherent spin precession in a (Ga, Mn)As ferromagnetic semiconductor excited by circularly polarized laser pulses. During the pump pulse, the spin angular momentum of photo-carriers generated by the absorbed light is transferred to the collective magnetization of the ferromagnet. We analyse quantitatively the observed magnetization dynamics triggered by the optical spin transfer torque using independently determined micromagnetic parameters and magneto-optical coefficients of the studied (Ga, Mn)As.
abstract_cn: 自旋传递转矩是将进入铁磁体的自旋极化电流的角动量传递给磁化的现象。这种效应开辟了磁性纳米结构中电驱动磁化动力学的新研究领域，并在新一代存储设备和可调振荡器的开发中发挥了重要作用。激光脉冲对磁性系统的光激发已经是一个独立的研究领域，其目的是在短时间内探索磁化动力学并实现超快自旋电子器件。我们报告了光学自旋传递扭矩的实验观察结果，这是几年前理论上预测的结果，在自旋电子学的这两个领域之间架起了桥梁。在泵浦和探针光学实验中，我们测量了由圆偏振激光脉冲激发的（Ga，Mn）As铁磁半导体中的相干自旋进动。在泵浦脉冲期间，由吸收的光产生的光载波的自旋角动量被转移到铁磁体的集体磁化强度。我们使用独立确定的微磁参数和所研究的（Ga，Mn）As的磁光系数来定量分析由光学自旋传递扭矩触发的观测磁化动力学。

title: Attosecond control of collective electron motion in plasmas
title_cn: 等离子体中集体电子运动的阿秒控制
abstract: Today, light fields of controlled and measured waveform can be used to guide electron motion in atoms and molecules with attosecond precision. Here, we demonstrate attosecond control of collective electron motion in plasmas driven by extreme intensity (≈1018 W cm−2) light fields. Controlled few-cycle near-infrared waves are tightly focused at the interface between vacuum and a solid-density plasma, where they launch and guide subcycle motion of electrons from the plasma with characteristic energies in the multi-kiloelectronvolt range—two orders of magnitude more than has been achieved so far in atoms and molecules. The basic spectroscopy of the coherent extreme ultraviolet radiation emerging from the light–plasma interaction allows us to probe this collective motion of charge with sub-200 as resolution. This is an important step towards attosecond control of charge dynamics in laser-driven plasma experiments.
abstract_cn: 如今，可控和测量波形的光场可用于以原子秒为单位引导原子和分子中的电子运动。 在这里，我们演示了由极端强度（＆＃8776; 10 <sup> 18 </ sup>＆＃8201; W＆＃8201; cm <sup>＆＃8722; 2 </ sup >）光场。 受控的几个周期的近红外波紧紧地聚焦在真空与固体密度等离子体之间的界面上，在那里它们发射并引导来自等离子体的电子的亚周期运动，该等离子体具有在几千电子伏特范围内的特征能量。 迄今为止，原子和分子的数量级都比以前大。 从光与等离子体相互作用产生的相干极紫外辐射的基本光谱学使我们能够以亚200-＃8201作为分辨率探测这种电荷的集体运动。 这是在激光驱动的等离子体实验中实现秒动态控制电荷动力学的重要一步。</ p>

title: The energy–speed–accuracy trade-off in sensory adaptation
title_cn: 感觉适应中的能量，速度，精度折衷
abstract: Adaptation is the essential process by which an organism becomes better suited to its environment. The benefits of adaptation are well documented, but the cost it incurs remains poorly understood. Here, by analysing a stochastic model of a minimum feedback network underlying many sensory adaptation systems, we show that adaptive processes are necessarily dissipative, and continuous energy consumption is required to stabilize the adapted state. Our study reveals a general relation among energy dissipation rate, adaptation speed and the maximum adaptation accuracy. This energy–speed–accuracy relation is tested in the Escherichia coli chemosensory system, which exhibits near-perfect chemoreceptor adaptation. We identify key requirements for the underlying biochemical network to achieve accurate adaptation with a given energy budget. Moreover, direct measurements confirm the prediction that adaptation slows down as cells gradually de-energize in a nutrient-poor medium without compromising adaptation accuracy. Our work provides a general framework to study cost-performance trade-offs for cellular regulatory functions and information processing.
abstract_cn: 适应是生物体更好地适应其环境的基本过程。适应的好处已有充分的文献记载，但其产生的成本仍知之甚少。在这里，通过分析基于许多感觉适应系统的最小反馈网络的随机模型，我们表明适应过程必定是耗散的，并且需要连续的能量消耗来稳定适应状态。我们的研究揭示了能量耗散率，适应速度和最大适应精度之间的一般关系。此能量速度精确度关系在大肠杆菌化学感应系统中进行了测试，该系统表现出近乎完美的化学感受器适应性。我们确定基本生化网络的关键要求，以在给定的能源预算下实现准确的适应。此外，直接测量证实了这样的预测：随着细胞在营养不良的培养基中逐渐失去能量，适应速度会降低，而不会影响适应精度。我们的工作为研究细胞监管功能和信息处理的成本－性能折衷提供了一个通用框架。

title: The organization of strong links in complex networks
title_cn: 复杂网络中强大链接的组织
abstract: Many complex systems reveal a small-world topology, which allows simultaneously local and global efficiency in the interaction between system constituents. Here, we report the results of a comprehensive study that investigates the relation between the clustering properties in such small-world systems and the strength of interactions between its constituents, quantified by the link weight. For brain, gene, social and language networks, we find a local integrative weight organization in which strong links preferentially occur between nodes with overlapping neighbourhoods; we relate this to global robustness of the clustering to removal of the weakest links. Furthermore, we identify local learning rules that establish integrative networks and improve network traffic in response to past traffic failures. Our findings identify a general organization for complex systems that strikes a balance between efficient local and global communication in their strong interactions, while allowing for robust, exploratory development of weak interactions.
abstract_cn: 许多复杂的系统揭示了一个小世界的拓扑，它允许在系统组成部分之间进行交互时同时实现局部和全局效率。在这里，我们报告了一项全面研究的结果，该研究调查了这种小世界系统中的聚类属性与其组成之间的相互作用强度之间的关系，并通过链接权重对其进行了量化。对于大脑，基因，社交和语言网络，我们找到了一个本地综合权重组织，在这种组织中，紧密联系优先出现在具有重叠邻居的节点之间；我们将此与群集的全局鲁棒性相关联，以消除最弱的链接。此外，我们确定了建立集成网络并响应过去的流量故障而改善网络流量的本地学习规则。我们的发现确定了一个复杂系统的一般组织，该组织在其强大的交互中可以实现有效的本地通信和全球通信之间的平衡，同时可以使弱交互的功能强大且具有探索性。
